abstract: A rescue plan for Citigroup turned into a boon for Wall Street. The Dow rose nearly 400 points, and the S.&P. was up 6.47 percent.
snippet: A rescue plan for Citigroup turned into a boon for Wall Street. The Dow rose nearly 400 points, and the S.&P. was up 6.47 percent.
lead_paragraph: Sometimes, a crazy day in the market is not necessarily a bad thing.

headline.main: Markets Surge for a Second Day; Dow Up Nearly 400
headline.print_headline: Citigroup Rescue Plan Drives Markets Higher
